(:action set ; Set up a group or assign roles
  :parameters (?entity1 - entity ?entity2 - entity ?group - group)
  :precondition (and (not (in ?entity1 ?group)) (not (in ?entity2 ?group)))
  :effect (and (in ?entity1 ?group) (in ?entity2 ?group))

(:action talk_in_private ; find a private place to talk and hold meetings
  :parameters (?p - player ?npc - non_player_character ?sg - spy_group)
  :precondition (and (in ?p ?sg) (in ?npc ?sg) (not (has_private_place ?sg)))
  :effect (and (has_private_place ?sg))

(:action talk ;  Engage in a conversation or meeting and update the state of the group
  :parameters (?p - person ?npc - non_player_character ?grp - group)
  :precondition (and (in ?p ?grp) (in ?npc ?grp) (not (has_private_place ?grp)))
  :effect (has_private_place ?grp)
)

(:action gather ; Gather resources or identify targets for a group
    :parameters (?p - player ?item - object ?sg - group)
    :precondition (and (in ?p ?sg) (not (has_item ?sg ?item)))
    :effect (has_item ?sg ?item))

(:action spy
  ; Establish and prepare a spy group, and check that all prerequisites are complete
  :parameters (?p - player ?sg - spy_group ?gear - object ?equipment - object ?victim - victim ?place - location)
  :precondition (and 
    (not (group_is_ready ?sg))
    (in ?p ?sg)
    (has_private_place ?sg ?place)
    (has_gear ?sg ?gear)
    (has_equipment ?sg ?equipment)
    (has_victim ?sg ?victim))
  :effect (and
    (group_is_ready ?sg))
